# JacklynSellz — Landing Page Design System

*Generated by: `ui-ux-pro-max` skill | Date: 2026-02-19*

---

## Pattern: Hero + Testimonials + CTA

| Section | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| 1. Hero | Headline + subheadline + primary CTA |
| 2. Problem Statement | Why the current affiliate landscape is broken |
| 3. Solution Overview | What JacklynSellz offers |
| 4. Testimonials / Social Proof | Trust signals, partner quotes (when available) |
| 5. Final CTA | Repeat CTA with urgency |

**CTA Placement:** Hero (sticky) + Post-testimonials
**Color Strategy:** Hero uses brand teal. Testimonials on light bg (#F5F5F5). CTA buttons in vibrant blue.

---

## Style: Trust & Authority

Keywords: Certificates/badges, expert credentials, case studies with metrics, industry recognition
Best For: Premium, professional services, trust-driven brands
Performance: ⚡ Excellent | Accessibility: ✓ WCAG AAA

---

## Color Palette

| Role | Hex | Usage |
|------|-----|-------|
| **Primary** | `#0F766E` | Headers, nav, key elements |
| **Secondary** | `#14B8A6` | Accents, highlights, hover states |
| **CTA** | `#0369A1` | Buttons, links, action elements |
| **Background** | `#F0FDFA` | Page background |
| **Text** | `#134E4A` | Body text, paragraphs |

*Palette rationale: Trust teal + professional blue. Avoids generic AI purple/pink.*

---

## Typography

| Role | Font | Mood |
|------|------|------|
| **Headings** | Lexend | Corporate, trustworthy, clean |
| **Body** | Source Sans 3 | Accessible, readable, professional |

**Google Fonts Import:**
```css
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lexend:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=Source+Sans+3:wght@300;400;500;600;700&display=swap');
```

---

## Key Effects
- Badge hover effects
- Metric pulse animations
- Certificate carousel
- Smooth stat reveal on scroll

---

## Anti-Patterns to Avoid
- ❌ Generic filler content
- ❌ No credentials or proof points
- ❌ AI-default purple/pink gradients
- ❌ Emojis as icons (use Heroicons or Lucide SVGs)

---

## Pre-Delivery Checklist
- [ ] No emojis as icons (use SVG: Heroicons/Lucide)
- [ ] `cursor-pointer` on all clickable elements
- [ ] Hover states with smooth transitions (150-300ms)
- [ ] Light mode text contrast 4.5:1 minimum
- [ ] Focus states visible for keyboard navigation
- [ ] `prefers-reduced-motion` respected
- [ ] Responsive at: 375px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px
